children.description:
Based on the previous actions and their outcomes, it seems that the function `summarize_objects_for_agent007` is not working correctly. Therefore, I will try a different approach and use the `works_list_for_agent007` function to get a list of work items similar to TKT-123, and then summarize them manually.

Here is my plan:
1. Call the `works_list_for_agent007` function to get a list of work items similar to TKT-123.
2. Extract the IDs of the work items from the response.
3. Loop through the list of IDs and call the `summarize_objects_for_agent007` function for each work item.
4. Manually summarize each work item by extracting relevant information such as title, description, and priority.
5. Create new issues for each summarized work item using the `create_actionable_tasks_from_text_for_agent007` function.
6. Prioritize the created issues based on their priority.

function.name: works_list_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns a list of IDs work items matching the request. To know more about the works, use the summarize_objects API."

owned_by.description: Filters for work owned by any of these users

issue_priority.description: Filters for issues with any of the provided priorities. Allowed values: p0, p1, p2, p3

created_by.description: Filters for work created by any of these users

applies_to_part.description: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts

issue_rev_orgs.description: Filters for issues with any of the provided Rev organizations

stage_name.description: Filters for records in the provided stage(s) by name

ticket_needs_response.description: Filters for tickets that need a response

ticket_rev_org.description: Filters for tickets associated with any of the provided Rev organizations

ticket_severity.description: Filters for tickets with any of the provided severities. Allowed values: blocker, high, low, medium

ticket_source_channel.description: Filters for tickets with any of the provided source channels

type.description: Filters for work of the provided types. Allowed values: issue, ticket, task

function.name: summarize_objects_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Summarizes a list of objects. The object can be anything such as a issue, work item etc. The function returns a Human readable description of the given object. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail."

objects.description: List of objects or IDs of objects in str format to summarize

function.name: add_work_items_to_sprint_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Adds the given work items to the sprint"

work_ids.description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.

sprint_id.description: The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

function.name: get_sprint_id_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the ID of the current sprint"

function.name: get_similar_work_items_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns a list of IDs work items/issues that are similar to the given work item/issue. To know more about the works, use the summarize_objects API."

work_id.description: The ID of the work item/issue for which you want to find similar items/issue

function.name: search_object_by_name_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Given a search string, returns the id of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the confidence is highest."

function.name: create_actionable_tasks_from_text_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item."

function.name: who_am_i_for_agent007
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "agent007", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the ID of the current user, also represented by 'my' in the prompts"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.agent007: An interface to database which tracks the work items such as issues, features, bugs etc. Provides APIs to retrieve, summarize, change the database related to production cycle.
